com.almis.alu.batch.services.controller

Class BatchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • AWEController
      • com.almis.alu.batch.services.controller.BatchController

  • public class BatchController
extends AWEController

    BatchController Class

    Provides an asyncronous batch launch service

    Author:
    Pablo GARCIA - 05/JUL/2010

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceData createProcess(java.lang.String Bat, java.lang.String PrcParNam)
      Create a batch process This method gets a new key for a batch process and inserts the batch-process relation in the table.
      ServiceData insertArgument(java.lang.String Bat, java.lang.String Prc, java.lang.String TskNam, java.lang.String ArgNam, java.lang.String ArgVal)
      Insert argument value for a batch process This method inserts a value for an argument of a task for a batch process Before try to insert arguments value the process must be created using BatchController.

      • createProcess

        public ServiceData createProcess(java.lang.String Bat,
                        java.lang.String PrcParNam)
                          throws AWException
        Create a batch process This method gets a new key for a batch process and inserts the batch-process relation in the table. The new generated key is saved as integer in the variable defined in the "PrcParNam" parameter. The service that invokes to this method is "aluBatPrcCre"
        Parameters:
        Bat - Batch name
        PrcParNam - Name of parameter in which save the generated process identifier
        Returns:
        Service data
        Throws:
        AWException

      • insertArgument

        public ServiceData insertArgument(java.lang.String Bat,
                         java.lang.String Prc,
                         java.lang.String TskNam,
                         java.lang.String ArgNam,
                         java.lang.String ArgVal)
                           throws AWException
        Insert argument value for a batch process This method inserts a value for an argument of a task for a batch process Before try to insert arguments value the process must be created using BatchController.#createProcess service. The service that invokes to this method is "aluBatPrcInsTskArg"
        Parameters:
        Bat - Batch name
        Prc - Process identifier
        TskNam - Name of the task
        ArgNam - Name of the argument
        ArgVal - Argument value
        Returns:
        Service data
        Throws:
        AWException
